structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts
General Provisions Relative To Executors And Administrators

law.catch_line: Failure To Appoint Agent As Cause For Removal
law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 14. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] Failure by an executor or administrator to comply with any provision of the two preceding sections shall be cause for removal.
